basics.name: WIP Anders Bohn Jespersen
basics.label: Scala Developer
basics.summary: Versatile and strong problem solver on all levels. Agile, Architecture, Design, Coding, DevOps, Bleeding edge tech. Able to do the right thing in a cool way in very reasonable time. Given good directions and not too inhuman time frame, I will deliver as promised. Can ofc work independently, but much prefer to be on site with a great team.

education.studyType: HHx - Business, Marketing, Economics, Accounting, Law

education.area: Datanom - IT Management and Software development

references.name: Ask me. Available from Leonteq Securities AG in German and from Teralytics AG in English
Request some wishes in terms of Company I worked for and role, and I will go find one for you :-)

skills.name: DevOps
keywords: Kubernetes / OnPrem and Google Cloud / AWS

awards.title: Software Engineer on Mobility Analytics Platform
highlights: Focus switch onto very big data
Using Spark on Mesos, Python Pandas, Jupyter, ...
Including learning about Hadoop and other new big data storage platforms.
Designed a cutting edge Microlith using ZIO to serve data from object storage to a Clickhouse cluster.

awards.title: Scala Developer on Market Price Monitoring System
awards.summary: Primary Scala Developer on greenfield spot price monitoring system.
highlights: Built 24x7 spot price monitoring service from the ground up with on Akka. Use of ScalaZ, Oracle backend and several integrations with existing systems
Full UI built with Play, HTML5 and JQuery
In production 12 months+
End of 2016, a complete rewrite to run on a new Elasticsearch index, use Rest services on Akka Http Server for a brand new GUI built with Angular 2 and Typescript (also in production).

awards.title: Scala Developer on Electrical Power Trading System
awards.summary: Complete rewrite in Scala of an existing system for power trading and reporting.
highlights: Front-end built with Adobe Flex and back-end with JBoss ESB, JavaEE and Scala.
Daily registration and calculations on bids on the market.
Control room functions with aggregate view of all production and consumption clients
Automated starting and stopping of production/consumption at connected facilities when bids on regulating power are activated.

awards.title: IT Architect on Land Registration System
awards.summary:
Lead Architect/Core Architect on eTL for the Courts of Denmark, the Land Registration Court. Complete move to electronic registration of deeds, mortgages and easements on all real estate in Denmark.
        Note: Hired in from Lenio by contract owner, CSC, as Lead Architect.
highlights: Core participator on the domain modelling for complex rural real estate deeds.
Designer and implementor for template based, pre-approved registrations.
